Text.val: // author: Peter van der Veen, created 26.06.2001
04.07.2014 SH SCR19007 BPH221 Added new TMPJ fields
13.09.2012 SH SCR17570 Extended SCF test to set v.RUNTYPE = C
17.01.2011 SH SCR16143 BPH222 Removed test BNKA_ADMNO1 = 0 to
set v.RUNTYPE = A
18.11.2010 SH SCR15994 BPH222 Changed logic to set v.RUNTPYE and added test for
supply chain finance
02.12.2005 SH SCR9669 BPH222 Added test on BNKA_CODETYPEACCOUNT = 2
to update v.RUNNTYPE = 'A'
27.06.2005 SH SCR8575 BPH222 Added test on CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL = 'Y'
to update v.RUNNTYPE = 'A' or 'B'
21.04.2005 SH SCR 8163 Add new argument PI.BADT_DATLASTDAILYSTATEMENT
for call of BPH223C
20.08.2004 SH SCR6809 Added new para BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTS for call to
15.06.2004 JJ SCR6394 added GSET(36) dependent submit BPH280
05.09.2003 SH SCR4246 BPH222 Extended CND to set v.RUNTYPE = A and B with
- CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT
07.10.2002 SH Add new argument for BPH223C --> BADT_ONDESKTOP will be updated
- in current program
17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH add new field "BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER" need to call diff.
- programs which uses this number to obtain table BADT with primary key
10.07.2002 SH Enable call to BPH107, was disabled for testing
-- 03.04.2002 SH Changed type for PI.RUNNUMBER into alpahnumeric and converted
- back to numeric (see T.R.). We also have to create this parenttask to convert
- first the v.PI_RUNNUMBER, because in the subtask this parameter will be used
- for the range to table BADT.
-- 20.03.2002 SH diff. changes according to new SPECS
-- converted PI.RUNUMBER into numeric
-- need for errrohandling on AS400, see T.R.
-- convert PI.RUNNUMBER to numeric (= default databsae type)
// This virtual is relevant for 223 C, since A and B are handled in 1
// transaction
// All BADT rows are handled: BPH 225 in one transaction
-- Check for Supply chain finaince, used to set V.RUNTYPE
-- Define runtype
// BPH 223 A and BPH 224 in one transaction
// BPH 223 B and BPH 224 in one transaction
// BPH 223 C (and BPH 224 in one transaction)

Header.Description: BPH 225 Updates if all BADT ar

Text.val: transaction: open TEMP_JOB
// BPH 225 C Delete TEMP_JOBSTATUS row
// BPH 225 A Store ledger bookings

FormName.valUnicode: BPH 225 Updates if all BADT ar
